mapper.insert: insert into cata (cata_id, cata_level, cata_name, sub_cata_count, `sequence`, `enable`, parent_cata) values (#{cataId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cataLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subCataCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{parentCata,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update cata set cata_level = #{cataLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, cata_name = #{cataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_cata_count = #{subCataCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `sequence` = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `enable` = #{enable,jdbcType=CHAR}, parent_cata = #{parentCata,jdbcType=INTEGER} where cata_id = #{cataId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cata_id, cata_level, cata_name, sub_cata_count, `sequence`, `enable`, parent_cata from cata

insert.selectKey: select count(*) from cata where cata_id = #{cataId}
insert.if: insert into cata (cata_id, cata_level, cata_name, sub_cata_count, `sequence`, `enable`, parent_cata) values (#{cataId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cataLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subCataCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{parentCata,jdbcType=INTEGER})
